metadata.title: CVE-2013-7447 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the gdk_cairo_set_source_pixbuf function in gdk/gdkcairo.c in GTK+ before 3.9.8, as used in eom, gnome-photos, eog, gambas3, thunar, pinpoint, and possibly other applications, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a large image file, which triggers a large memory allocation.

criterions.comment: eog package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.18.1-1ubuntu2').
gambas3 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
gtk+2.0 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.24.29-1ubuntu2').
pinpoint package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
